content: Can someone try this poll and tell me how it is?
I don't know if it supports showing you your local time
but doodle is so full of ads I feel my soul shrink every time I use it
(this probably should be in the #wg-async-foundations stream instead?)

I'm guessing it's not really feasible to have these meetings any earlier? -- All of these times are still rather late (earliest one is 20:30pm CET), except Friday, which I prefer not to fill up with programming work either
If there aren't any other options I can probably join one, like, every other week? But double checking these really are the only options we have

(this probably should be in the #wg-async-foundations stream instead?)

yes, but I can't seem to move it now!

If there aren't any other options I can probably join one, like, every other week? But double checking these really are the only options we have

I just checked and it seemed like a lot of the options I thought I added didn't get added. I intended to leave the earliest time available every day, or almost every day.
I'll send it out again this week with correct options
